```{r}
training <- read.csv("/Users/andyshen/Desktop/Git/101C-Final/training.csv")
test <- read.csv("/Users/andyshen/Desktop/Git/101C-Final/test.csv")
```


```{r}
ind <- sample(1:nrow(training), size = floor(0.8 * nrow(training)), replace = F)
train <- training[ind, ]
ttest <- training[-ind, ]
```

```{r}
find_MSE <- function(data, preds) {
  if(length(preds) != length(data$growth_2_6)) {
    stop("Something is wrong here...")
  }
  sqrt(
    sum((data$growth_2_6 - preds)^2) / length(preds)
  )
}
```



```{r}
m <- glm(growth_2_6 ~ 
          hog_81 + avg_growth_mid_high + num_words  + count_vids_mid_high, 
        data = train)
summary(m)
```


```{r}
p <- predict(m, ttest)
find_MSE(ttest, p)
```
